bio: Since Kidswaste first started writing songs in his bedroom studio in the north of France, much has changed for Quentin Beauvois. He has spent the last few years uncovering and discovering his sound, which can be described as a dance between indie, folk, electronic and pop. He's collaborated with high-caliber artists like Chelsea Cutler and gnash, his releases have amassed more than 75 million streams across various platforms. He has also toured with artists like ODESZA, Chet Porter, Jai Wolf, and DROELOE.
